Nyamabuye Hydropower Project

Project
Share Edit Project

Important Notice

This Project Information Memorandum (PIM) presented on the One Data platform is for the proposed Nyamabuye Hydropower Project in Uganda (the Project). This PIM has been prepared and approved for and on behalf of the Elemental Energy Limited (EEL) based in Uganda. This PIM is issued strictly for information purposes only for persons and/or organizations that may be interested in the planning and development of the project. This PIM does not purport to be all inclusive or to contain all the information that any person or organization may require to make decisions pertaining to the project. This PIM is intended solely to enhance the availability of project information. The data and dates presented should be considered as estimates only. For any decision-making information and disclosures regarding the project, please refer to and/or contact Elemental Energy Limited directly prior to the reliance on the information presented in the PIM. This PIM is subject to the policies, terms and conditions of Elemental Energy Limited.

Project brief description

The Nyamabuye HPP is a 7MW run-of-river project in Kisoro District. The main components of the project include: Intake Dam/Weir, Head race Canal, Forebay, Penstock, Powerhouse, Tail Race Canal, Switch Yard and Access Roads.

Primary energy resource Water
Primary Technology Hydropower
Description of Primary Technology Use of 2 Horizontal Axis Francis hydraulic turbines to harness the potential energy of the water flowing in the Kaku River
